Class DetailedTimerTask

java.lang.Object

      twcore.bots.zonerbot.DetailedTimerTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public abstract class DetailedTimerTask
extends java.util.TimerTask

Title:

DetailedTimerTask

Description:

This class keeps track of how long is left till the next advert.

Method Detail

getLifetime

public long getLifetime()
This method gets the lifetime of the entry.

Returns:
the number of milliseconds that the entry will remain in the set for is returned.

getTimeRemaining

public long getTimeRemaining()
This method gets the amount of time remaining before this object expires.

Returns:
the number of milliseconds remaining before the object expires is returned.

isExpired

public boolean isExpired()
This method checks to see if the timer has expired.

Returns:
true is returned if the timer has expired.

getTimeElapsed

public long getTimeElapsed()
This method gets the amount of time that the object has been in existance for.

Returns:
the amount of time that has elapsed since the object has been created is returned.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
This method converts the time remaining into a string of the form: "MM mins and SS secs.". If the timer has expired then "0 mins and 0 secs" is returned.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a string representing the time remaining is returned.
